Posts.Content: Hi scarlett i too am having severe breast pain and have no clue why. I also had a hysterectomy years ago i am now 32 if you get any info plz let me know.Hope all turns out well godbless
Posts.Title: Breast pain

Posts.Content: hi scarlett, i have heard all these things from other posts too but it sounds like you need to see another doc . my last doctor kept saing everthing in my life had to do with smoking i totaly disagree with most i will be making an appointment soon and ill let you know.goodluck i will keep following this post.
